subject: Order #SSN3690
description_text:
Hello!

Just placed the order #SSN3690.
Is it possible to be shipped from Europe warehouse in order to avoid
customs duties?
As you see, i am located in Greece.

Also do you have an ETA for the Simsonn Racing Simulator Sequential Shifter
that is currently out of stock?

Thanks,
-- 

Marios Spanos
Professional Drift Driver


+306981376246
spanosmarios177@gmail.com

[image: facebook icon] <https://www.facebook.com/mariosrotary>  [image:
instagram icon] <https://www.instagram.com/spanosmarios177/>
[image: logo] [image: banner]

conversations.body_text: Hi Marios Spanos,    Our German warehouse is currently out of stock. We will ship your order from Germany next week. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.  The Sequential Shifter is expected to complete its upgrade and be restocked in December.

Good Morning!

Any news on my order?

Best Regards
Marios Spanos


On Fri, 21 Nov 2025 at 12:33, support@simsonn.com

Hi Marios Spanos,  We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by the logistics delay. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock, with restocking expected to be completed by the 28th. At that time, we will ship your order via DHL and refund the additional shipping fees.

Thanks for your reply!

Let me know when you have the tracking number.

Best Regards
Marios Spanos


On Thu, 27 Nov 2025 at 13:07, support@simsonn.com
